references.reason: This paper is foundational to the approach used in 4diffusion, introducing the concept of using 2D diffusion models for 3D generation.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the high-resolution image synthesis technique using latent diffusion models, which is the basis for several components in the 4Diffusion architecture.

references.paper_title: Emerging properties in self-supervised vision transformers
references.reason: This paper introduces the vision transformer architecture which is used in 4DM, a key component of 4Diffusion.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion implicit models which are essential to the core method of 4diffusion.

references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF), which is the fundamental 3D representation technique leveraged by 4Diffusion to generate 4D content.
